body_html: Thanks for confirming that switching to conda fixes things. I suspect this is an environment problem caused by one of the libraries on which TensorFlow depends, but I don't think we'll be able to reproduce it. Feel free to reopen this if you can get any additional information about the crash.

I suspect this is an environment problem caused by one of the libraries on which TensorFlow depends, but I don't think we'll be able to reproduce it.
